idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# Fast, Upbeat Drum Loop

# Drums
kick = 36    # Kick drum
snare = 38   # Snare drum
hihat = 42   # Closed hi-hat

# Start at beginning
moveTo(0)

# Insert 2 bar fast drum pattern
# Each beat = 0.5 (make it faster and more upbeat)

# Bar 1
playNote(kick, beats=0.5)      # beat 1
playNote(hihat, beats=0.25)
playNote(hihat, beats=0.25)
playNote(snare, beats=0.5)     # beat 2
playNote(hihat, beats=0.25)
playNote(hihat, beats=0.25)
playNote(kick, beats=0.5)      # beat 3
playNote(hihat, beats=0.25)
playNote(hihat, beats=0.25)
playNote(snare, beats=0.5)     # beat 4
playNote(hihat, beats=0.25)
playNote(hihat, beats=0.25)

# Bar 2 (variation to make sound more engaging)
playNote(kick, beats=0.5)      # beat 1
playNote(hihat, beats=0.25)
playNote(hihat, beats=0.25)
playNote(snare, beats=0.5)     # beat 2
playNote(kick, beats=0.25)
playNote(hihat, beats=0.25)
playNote(kick, beats=0.5)      # beat 3
playNote(hihat, beats=0.25)
playNote(snare, beats=0.25)
playNote(hihat, beats=0.25)
playNote(snare, beats=0.5)     # beat 4
playNote(hihat, beats=0.25)
